description: Hydration tracking, gout-safe food reference, and flare-up logging for people managing gout. Designed for local storage first â€” no account required.
medicalDisclaimer: Gout Guardian is for informational purposes only and does not provide medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. It includes a gout-safe food reference and hydration tracking features intended solely for general educational purposes. This app is not a substitute for professional medical advice. Always seek the advice of a qualified healthcare provider before making any changes to your diet, lifestyle, or treatment plan.
children: Gout Guardian is not directed to children under the age of 13 and does not knowingly collect information from children. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us and we will promptly delete it.
